H0.text: In which town or city in Wales is the baked bean museum of excellence. Cardiff

A4.text: The Baked Bean Museum of Excellence was a private museum located in Port Talbot, Wales, United Kingdom.

A5.text: Bangor-on-Dee (Welsh: Bangor-is-Coed or Bangor-is-y-Coed), Wrexham, Wales
